creator: bugzillameow

content:
The issue is not with the Thunderbird 147.0 dmg download but due to you using the old EOL macOS 10.13

Thunderbird and Firefox versions from 116.0 to current 147.0 requires macOS 10.15 (ten.fifteen) or later to run.

Thunderbird 115.18.0esr was the last to support macOS 10.12, 10.13, 10.14

You can go to https://archive.mozilla.org/pub/thunderbird/releases/115.18.0/mac/ then pick your language folder then download the Thunderbird 115.18.0.dmg
creator: James

content: You can copy the file, but not import it That is, you can, with thunderbird not running, copy from one profile and place into another. If everything in the second profile is identical, the filters should work. Fortunately, the file is a simple text file that can be manipulated with a text editor, such as Notepad. I don't mean to oversimplify the process; some setups with complex filters need careful tweaks to work properly. The SAFE way is to copy the complete profile, not just the filters. Good luck.
creator: davidsk

content: Ovvero, come procedi? che errore riscontri?
creator: @next

content:
Hai attivato l'autenticazione a 2 fattori?

Per poter inquadrare il problema inoltre prova a fornire queste informazioni:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)
  8. Screenshot del problema (se utile a chiarire il contesto)
creator: @next

creator: sfhowes

content:
Zweifelnder said
Der bisher etablierte Workflow „manuell alle POP3-Konten abrufen“ ist in aktuellen Thunderbird-Versionen faktisch nicht mehr nutzbar. Für langjährige POP3-Nutzer ist das eine massive Verschlechterung der Bedienbarkeit.

Weißt du, dass man Nachrichten auch abrufen kann, ohne Tastenkürzel zu benutzen? 1. es gibt den Button "Abrufen" (für alle Konten) ganz oben über der Konten/Ordnerliste (rot umrandet in meiner Grafik). 2. Menü Datei > Neue Nachrichten abrufen > Alle Konten (Grafik)

Ich benutze kein Windows, kann also deine Feststellung nicht überprüfen, dass das Tastenkürzel Shift + F5 nicht mehr funktioniert. Aber ist Thunderbird deshalb unbedienbar geworden, nur weil deine Routine gestört ist? Welcher ist der Zeitgewinn zwischen der Ausführung des Tastenkürzel und einem Klick auf einen bestimmten Button im Thunderbird-Fenster?
creator: Mapenzi

content: Go to settings>privacy&security and make sure that cookies are accepted. That sometimes helps.
creator: davidsk

content: Also, be sure to enable IMAP on the gmail website.
creator: davidsk

content: Right-click the account, Subscribe..., Refresh. Uncheck Sent Items and check Sent Mail. Sent Mail will display as Sent in the Folder Pane. Also, uncheck 'Place a copy in' in Account Settings, Copies & Folders.
creator: sfhowes

content: Check to see if you still have a Gmail connections, such as a Gmail calendar or addressbook.
creator: davidsk

content: Is this the Trash folder of a POP account? Account Settings > account name > Server Settings > Server Type ....

content: IMAP server
creator: gwn104

content: If you have used the right-click "Empty Trash" command there is no hope to recover the deleted messages, unless you have a recent Thunderbird profile backup. The "Empty Trash" command automatically resets the Trash file in the Thunderbird profile to 0 kB. N.B. a trash folder is no repertory to store possibly important messages
creator: Mapenzi
